categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Rommus was a Human male commander in the Imperial Military of the reconstituted Sith Empire who served during the Battle of Corellia in the Galactic War against the Galactic Republic. He was stationed in the Blastfield Shipyards on the planet Corellia, where he was killed during the fighting.
Commander Rommus appears as a Champion boss unrelated to any mission in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. This article assumes full game completion, and thus that Rommus was killed.
